content:
That's great to hear! Congratulations on your new swim cap and goggles from Speedo! It's always exciting to try out new gear, and I'm sure you'll enjoy using them during your morning swims at Bay Club West Valley.

Remember to break in your new swim cap and goggles gradually to ensure a comfortable fit. You might also want to consider adjusting the goggles' straps and nosepiece to get the perfect fit for your face.

Since you'll be swimming in the morning, don't forget to arrive a bit early to get settled and comfortable before your swim. You might also want to bring a towel, water bottle, and any other essentials you need to get ready for your swim.

Most importantly, have fun and enjoy your swim! Lap swimming can be a great way to clear your mind, get some exercise, and set a positive tone for the day. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need any further assistance.

Happy swimming!
